placements.description: Good credit begins with knowing where you credit is today, learning how to make smarter financial decisions tomorrow, and protecting your credit moving forward.
placements.taxFreeTermsAndConditions:
PAYMENT INFORMATION

When you complete your order here, you will begin your 30-day trial membership in Experian IdentityWorks℠ Premium. You may cancel your trial membership at any time within 30 days without charge. If you decide not to cancel, your membership will continue and you will be billed for just $<%month_price%> for each month that you continue your membership. You may cancel your membership and stop the monthly billing by contacting us at any time. However, you will not be eligible for a pro-rated refund of your current month's paid membership fee.

benefits.name: Daily Experian Credit Report & FICO<sup>®</sup> Scores

placements.negativeOptionsDisclaimer:
IMPORTANT INFORMATION:

When you complete your order here, you will begin your 30-day trial membership in Experian IdentityWorks℠ Premium. If you don't cancel your membership within the 30-day trial period*, you will be billed $<%month_price%> for each month that you continue your membership. You may cancel your trial membership anytime within the trial period without charge.

*The credit monitoring benefit with Experian begins within 48 hours of enrollment in your trial. Credit Monitoring with Equifax and TransUnion takes approximately 4 days to begin, though in some cases cannot be initiated during your trial period. You may cancel your trial membership any time during your first 34 days without charge.

placements.advertisingTerms:
When you complete your order here, you will begin your 30-day trial membership in Experian IdentityWorks℠ Premium. If you don't cancel your membership within the 30-day trial period*, you will be billed $<%month_price%> for each month that you continue your membership. You may cancel your trial anytime within the trial period without charge.

Credit score calculated based on FICO Score 8 model. Your lender or insurer may user a different FICO Score than FICO Score 8, or another type of credit score altogether. Learn more.

*Monitoring with Experian begins within 48 hours of enrollment in your trial. Monitoring with Equifax and TransUnion takes approximately 4 days to begin, though in some cases cannot be initiated during your trial period. You may cancel your trial membership any time during your first 34 days without charge

placements.advertisingTerms: Better protect your identity and credit with advanced ID Theft Protection alerts and 3-bureau credit monitoring. Try Experian IdentityWorks℠ Premium for 30 days for free, then just $<%month_price%> a month. You may cancel your membership at any time if not satisfied.
placements.refundDisclaimer: When you begin your membership in <%offer_name%>, you will end your <%current_subscription_name%> subscription. A pro-rated refund for the remaining days in your current subscription will be applied to the credit card used when purchasing <%current_subscription_name%>.
